MPM.content: what if ontological difference is translated into rhetoric of memory? or vice versa?
present-ness of present introduces ontological difference

OS.content: difference btwn Being/beings, Heidegger’s discourse of trace > if difference (is) (itself) trace (neither presence nor absence): trace of trace has disappeared in the forgetting of the difference btwn Being/beings [forgetting of Being as annihilation of trace]

differance as a difference older than Being itself, a still more unthought difference than difference of Being/beings > leads to a writing that exceeds all dialectics, w/out history, cause, absence, presence, archia, telos

POS.content: Derrida is “above all” made possible by Heidegger’s ontological difference (the unthought difference btwn Being and beings), yet Nietzsche is “perhaps” a move beyond the ontotheology of Heidegger, toward a differance no longer in language of West
to become attuned to a difference beyond that btwn Being and beings is not possible today, but we can show how it is in preparation

ATIA.content: restructuring (pluralizing/varying) “as such” in relation to animal would upset whole framework of Heideggerian discourse, the ontological difference

DIF.content: it’s domination of beings (Being as presence or beingness) that differance solicits, questions, makes tremble in entirety: question emerges where ontological difference is broached (s’ouvre)
differance (is) older than ontological difference: outside epochality of Being (outside epoch): no depth to bottomless chessboard on which Being is put to play
is this why Heraclitean play of hen diapheron heautōi, the one differing from itself, in difference w/ itself, is lost like a trace when diapherein is determined as ontological difference?
Heidegger: when the essence of presencing unnoticeably becomes something present, the distinction btwn presencing and what is present (Anwesen und Anwesendem) is forgotten
forgetting of ontological difference: disappearance of trace of trace > Heidegger: even the early trace (die frühe Spur) is obliterated when presence is in the position of the highest
trace & difference cannot appear as such, sheltered (s’abrite)/dissimulated in names (received in metaphysical text)

Gi.content: will not be a question of heights, thinking difference not up to it [in contrast to Nietzsche?]
for Heidegger, sexual difference did not rise to height of ontological difference? > ontic predicate

REST.content: what looks like a process of fetishization in Heidegger (uselessness of product at work in work) is, to Heidegger, a strange process of alētheia

DST.content: désistance: mimesis or its double, cela même qu’elle double et abîme (what it doubles & engulfs)— alētheia

for Heidegger, opposition btwn inadequate/adequate circumscribed by alētheia’s withdrawal—yet, Lacoue-Labarthe’s mimesis haunts alētheia w/ unstable homoiōsis ——abyss of pre-originary mimesis, “precedes” truth, introduces desire for homoiōsis > Derrida explains how, w/ this thinking, Lacoue-Labarthe dislocates Heidegger’s epochal history

WOG.content: hen diapheron heautôi (Heraclitus) is Greek heritage Derrida is most faithful to, tries to think this “one differing from itself” alongside (“improbably”) the khōra > the very event of the même, the soi-même: under this sign, Derrida contrasted differance to ontological difference [cf. DIF p. 22]

CHOR.content: very obscure area, passage btwn ontological difference & sexual difference not punctuated by polarities (originary/derived, ontological/ontic…)
